headline: Can Buffett Bets Like Coke, Food Brands Recession-Proof Your Portfolio?
summary: Markus Hansen, portfolio manager and senior research analyst of Vontobel Asset Management, joins WSJ's Take On the Week podcast to talk about whether household beverage and food brands, like Coca-Cola, Oreo and Pringles, are the ultimate recession trade.
